edu.proz.checkers.client.controller

Class GameController

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.proz.checkers.client.controller.GameController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Runnable

    public class GameController
extends Object
implements Runnable
    Class responsible for controlling the state of the game; is runnable as thread - includes the main loop of the game; includes message-processing methods and checkers logic rules; synchronized with runnable ConnectionController class using BlockingQueues

      • run

        public void run()
        Overrides run method. Includes the main loop of the Controller's thread activity, which is repeatedly waiting for users action then sending the message of taken action to ConnectionController through RequestQueue then asking for Response from the server and processing it accordingly to its class
        Specified by:
        run in interface Runnable
        See Also:
        Request, Response, Runnable.run()

        public void processResponse()
                     throws InterruptedException

      • selectTheSquare

        public void selectTheSquare(Square square)
        Method used in mouse listener to update the list of selected squares and if the player selects the pawn and makes move by choosing appropriate square possible to move, the function allows him to make move.
        Parameters:

      • isThePlayersTurnNow

        public boolean isThePlayersTurnNow()

        Returns:
